What is this website?

    I don’t know.

    So let’s figure this out.

    My name is Mansen. You may know me by other names. That’s fine. I am Mansen here.

    I am a man of many talents –writing excluded– look, I know why you’re here. You want a glimpse into the man, the myth, the legend. You will find no such thing. There is no myth, no legend. The man is here, though. You expect extravagance, I know.

    Of course I am versed in the Arcane Arts. Yes, I have conquered great mountains.

    No, do not compare me to the greats of yore.

    Why of course, help yourself to my collection of spells. No doubt you will find amusement, perhaps illumination.

    I inscribed these spells during my journeys. They were meant for my eyes, not polished, not perfect, only real. I do not have a documentarian… Ah, yes! This grimoire exists for that reason. I shall document my journey here.
